summary: The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.
cast: Paul Scofield|Wendy Hiller|Leo McKern|Robert Shaw|Orson Welles|Susannah York|Nigel Davenport|John Hurt|Corin Redgrave|Colin Blakely|Cyril Luckham|Jack Gwillim|Thomas Heathcote|Yootha Joyce|Anthony Nicholls|John Nettleton|Eira Heath|Molly Urquhart|Paul Hardwick|Michael Latimer|Philip Brack|Martin Boddey|Eric Mason|Matt Zimmerman|Vanessa Redgrave|Raymond Adamson|Chris Adcock|Trevor Baxter|Sylvia Bidmead|Jack Bligh|Bridget Brice|Jan Carey|David Collings|Gladys Dawson|Howard Douglas|Edwin Finn|Arthur Goodman|Laura Graham|Raymond Graham|Harvey Hall|Gay Hamilton|Fiona Hartford|Drewe Henley|Walter Horsbrugh|Ross Hutchinson|Donald Layne-Smith|Graham Leaman|Leonard Llewellyn|Patrick Marley|Julie Martin|Robert Mill|Robert Morris|Arnold Peters|Christine Pollon|Arnold Ridley|Johnny Rossi|Jack Sharp|Iain Sinclair|Philip Stewart|Nick Tate|Michael Wade|Gina Warwick|Fred Wood
title: Un hombre para la eternidad
